sourcesContent:
// BillDetails.js import React from 'react'; import './BillDetails.css'; // Create a corresponding CSS file for styling const BillDetails = () => { // Sample data, you can replace this with real data from your state or API const bill = { name: 'H.R.82 - Social Security Fairness Act of 2023', congress: '118th Congress', sponsor: 'Rep. Graves, Garrett R-LA-6', introducedDate: '01/09/2023', committee: 'House - Ways and Means', summary: ` This bill repeals provisions that reduce Social Security benefits for individuals who receive other benefits, such as a pension from a state or local government. The bill eliminates the government pension offset, which in various instances reduces Social Security benefits for spouses, widows, and widowers who also receive government pensions of their own. These changes are effective for benefits payable after December 2023. `, actions: [ { date: '01/09/20', action: 'Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means', actionBy: 'House of Representatives' }, { date: '01/09/20', action: 'Introduced in House', actionBy: 'House of Representatives' }, // Add more actions as needed ] }; return (

{bill.name}

{bill.congress}

Sponsor: {bill.sponsor} (Introduced {bill.introducedDate})
Committee: {bill.committee}
➜ ➜ ➜ ➜

Summary:

{bill.summary}

Timeline of Actions

{bill.actions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
Date Actions Action By
{action.date} {action.action} {action.actionBy}
); }; export default BillDetails;
